channel.title: >> DankScape [OPEN BETA] [317]
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://108.61.213.29/images/smashing-logo.png[/img][/CENTER]
[SIZE=1][I]Hey guys, I've recently started working on a little project to keep me from being bored out of my brains, don't really know where I'm going to take this, or whether I'm going to be doing anything serious with this, only time will tell.[/I][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][U][B]What is DankScape?[/B][/U][/SIZE] DankScape is a new private server that has only recently been available for public testing, the server's in it's early stages at the moment so expect some bugs. DankScape is hosted on a VPS and is online 24/7, at the moment our staff team is small so we may need some new faces to join our development team to assist us in managing the server, there are currently 5 in-game staff ranks, Server Support, Moderator, Administrator, Developer and Owner.
We're looking for numerous players to fill positions in our team such as media support members and a media support leader, in-game server support, forum moderators, forum administrators, in-game moderators and also in-game administrators. These positions will be available in the near future when the server gets off the ground.
We're hoping to gain a player base by posting threads on numerous forums such as RuneLocus and of course, rune-server. The objective from this is to gain enough players so that we know how to manage the server, e.g to take things more seriously such as management of updates & features.
[B][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE][/B] [spoiler=features] [b][center] - 24 working skills - Great combat system - In-game Achievements with achievement points system - PK Point System with a PK point shop - Amazing PvM with major bosses such as Nex and Corporal Beast - 'Nex' items such as Torva, Pernix and Virtus are available ingame - Working quests - Pest Control with pest control shop - Barrows minigame - Slayer teleports and duo slayer - Item lending system - Ability to switch to curse prayers - Max Cape and the Max hood - Customisable comp cape - Brawling Gloves - Clan Chat system - Summoning with summoning special attacks - Dungeoneering with multiple floors and complexities - Money Pouch with dupes fixed - XP Orb with XP Counter - Lunar and Ancient magic books - Emotes, including the skillcape emotes. - Great dicing system with clan-chat support - Mithril seeds with clipping. - 508 Gameframe - Custom teleport interfaces - Semi-working lodestones - Skilling task with rewards system - 4 Custom Donator ranks - Custom Veteran rank - Banking with working bank tabs - Custom loyalty titles[/b] [/spoiler]
[B][SIZE=5]Media[/SIZE][/B] [spoiler=media][center] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/ags%20spec.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/armadyl%20rune.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/armour%20interface.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/banktabs.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/clanchat.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/compcape.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/compcape2.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/cook.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/cooking%20and%20burning.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/curses.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/dh%20effect.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/dice.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/dicing%20in%20cc.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/dungshop.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/dungtab.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/info%20tab.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/items%20on%20death.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/lodestone.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/loyaltytitles.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/loyaltytitles1.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/max%20cape.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/mithril%20seeds.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/ornament%20kits.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/pvm.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/server%20support%20rank.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/veteran%20rank.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/ranks.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/rocktail%20cooking.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/rocktail%20fishing.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/skilling%20tele%20interface.png[/img] [img]http://108.61.213.29/rsps_images/veng.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[B][SIZE=5]Links[/SIZE][/B]
[B][COLOR=red]NOTE: If your client is a black or white screen, leave it open for 5-10 minutes, small problem with the 'Downloading Cache %' part atm, sorry, will be fixed soon.[/COLOR][/B]

item.title: >> DankScape [OPEN BETA] [317]
item.dc:creator: @BrandonRSPS BrandonRSPS
item.description:
@BrandonRSPS wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

[SIZE=1][I]Hey guys, I’ve recently started working on a little project to keep me from being bored out of my brains, don’t really know where I’m going to take this, or whether I’m going to be doing anything serious with this, only time will tell.[/I][/SIZE]

[SIZE=4][U][B]What is DankScape?[/B][/U][/SIZE]
DankScape is a new private server that has only recently been available for public testing, the server’s in it’s early stages at the moment so expect some bugs. DankScape is hosted on a VPS and is online 24/7, at the moment our staff team is small so we may need some new faces to join our development team to assist us in managing the server, there are currently 5 in-game staff ranks, Server Support, Moderator, Administrator, Developer and Owner.

We’re looking for numerous players to fill positions in our team such as media support members and a media support leader, in-game server support, forum moderators, forum administrators, in-game moderators and also in-game administrators. These positions will be available in the near future when the server gets off the ground.

We’re hoping to gain a player base by posting threads on numerous forums such as RuneLocus and of course, rune-server. The objective from this is to gain enough players so that we know how to manage the server, e.g to take things more seriously such as management of updates & features.

[B][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE][/B]
[spoiler=features]
[b][center]

  • 24 working skills
  • Great combat system
  • In-game Achievements with achievement points system
  • PK Point System with a PK point shop
  • Amazing PvM with major bosses such as Nex and Corporal Beast
  • ‘Nex’ items such as Torva, Pernix and Virtus are available ingame
  • Working quests
  • Pest Control with pest control shop
  • Barrows minigame
  • Slayer teleports and duo slayer
  • Item lending system
  • Ability to switch to curse prayers
  • Max Cape and the Max hood
  • Customisable comp cape
  • Brawling Gloves
  • Clan Chat system
  • Summoning with summoning special attacks
  • Dungeoneering with multiple floors and complexities
  • Money Pouch with dupes fixed
  • XP Orb with XP Counter
  • Lunar and Ancient magic books
  • Emotes, including the skillcape emotes.
  • Great dicing system with clan-chat support
  • Mithril seeds with clipping.
  • 508 Gameframe
  • Custom teleport interfaces
  • Semi-working lodestones
  • Skilling task with rewards system
  • 4 Custom Donator ranks
  • Custom Veteran rank
  • Banking with working bank tabs
  • Custom loyalty titles[/b]
    [/spoiler]

[B][SIZE=5]Media[/SIZE][/B]
[spoiler=media][center]































[/spoiler]

[B][SIZE=5]Links[/SIZE][/B]

[B][COLOR=red]NOTE: If your client is a black or white screen, leave it open for 5-10 minutes, small problem with the ‘Downloading Cache %’ part atm, sorry, will be fixed soon.[/COLOR][/B]
